### The who

I'm Ivan, a PhD student at Skoltech.
I research fusion of LiDAR with other remote sensing data for precision forestry.

### The what

My journey through learning geospatial data science.

### The how

[RMarkdown](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/),
[Quarto](https://quarto.org/),
[R](https://www.r-project.org), [Python](https://www.python.org),
[RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com),
[Netlify](https://www.netlify.com),
[giscus](https://giscus.app/),
and [Google Domains](https://domains.google):
these were the ingredients chosen to create the perfect little blog.
